content: this is a pattern for a hobo style tote or market bag put a liner in it and make it a purse or a knitting bag it s really up to you i used 235 grams of impeccable for mine - one ball of each color i also made the short strap the gauge isn t that important but the hook still needs to be smaller as you want a bag that doesn t stretch too much when full this bag is fun to make fully customizable and really cute make it what you want i also have helpful videos on my youtube chanel mimimustknit 1 1 https //www youtube com/playlist list=plgxusagoo0wqfvsbbx-ecxxy2cif7w9uc
